name: Where?
description: Where? is a platformer where you traverse inverted lands. Your avatar is a dream creature of sorts and you have to reach the end goal while fending off hateful creatures. I used the artwork from games like El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron, NiGHTS, and Okami as a visual reference. I really wanted to capture the surreal design and translucent colors as seen in those games. Something between a watercolor painting and cel-shaded style.
